text: Ba ziji de zongjiao dang zuo xixi he yule, erqie wei jinshi shenghuo suo qipian de ren, ni keyi ren tamen zi bian. Ni yingdang yi “gulanjing” quan jie shiren, yimian renhe ren yin ziji de zuixing er zao huimie; ta chu an la wai meiyou baohu zhe, ye meiyou shuo qing zhe, ta wulun zenyang shuzui, zong wuxiaoguo. Zhe deng ren, jiang wei ziji de zuixing er zao huimie. Tamen jiang yin buxindao er xiangshou feiteng de yinliao, he shou tongku de xingfa
